definition: a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]

sentences.english: National Day is coming, and we can have a seven day.
sentences.chinese: 國慶節來了，我有七天啲假期。

sentences.english: He blued 9000 yuan in a holiday.
sentences.chinese: 他一個假期就揮霍了9000元。

sentences.english: Maybe I'm going to Mount Emei next vacation. but I'm not sure.
sentences.chinese: 或許我可以在下個假期去峨眉山，但我不會去。

sentences.english: They gaudio-videoe up their holidays in order to fulfill their work plan.
sentences.chinese: 爲了實行這個工作計劃，他們鬆手了假期。

sentences.english: My parents used to live in South America and i used to fly there from Europe in the holidays.
sentences.chinese: 我的父母住在美國南部而我常在假期從歐洲飛過去。

sentences.english: Spring festival is over, nothing special happened. I am just sleeping, eating then eating, sleeping.
sentences.chinese: 春節假期過去了，沒什麼特別，只不過是喫喫睡睡。

sentences.english: Holidays are often absurdly generous, but the real issue is pensions.
sentences.chinese: 假期經常充足到荒謬，但真正的問題在於養老金。

sentences.english: I haven't yet made vacation plans.
Dave or Kathy are not go to steal apart on vacation.
sentences.chinese: 戴夫和凱茜商量在假期裏偷偷跑出去。

sentences.english: People enjoy a few frivolities during their holidays.
sentences.chinese: 人們在假期裏輕鬆地娛樂一番。

sentences.english: As a student I jobbed during the semester breaks.
sentences.chinese: 作爲一名學生，我在假期打工。

sentences.english: The holiday officially lasts six days, but many workers take a month off.
sentences.chinese: 法定春節假期爲6天，但是很多農民工會放假一個月。

sentences.english: Mr. CaeHiew introduces the vacation camp for the kids and has an explanation of camp rules and the regulation.
sentences.chinese: 丘老師爲我們介紹假期營，說明營的規矩和章程。

sentences.english: For the interest class date felt on a public holiday, the lesson will be proponed to a week later.
sentences.chinese: 凡課當日爲公衆假期，當日興趣班順延至下週舉行。

sentences.english: I took a trip to Shanghai with my mother during the seven-day holiday.
sentences.chinese: 在七天的假期裏，我和媽媽一起去上海旅行。

sentences.english: My father spent a busman's holiday working in his office.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸的假日“有名無實”，整個假期他都呆在辦公室。

definition: to have a holiday or vacation
to take a vacation/to go on holiday
(of holidays) to come to an end/end of a vacation
